This estate is{heavily}dependent on cars and is well connected to major roads and the M4. Does it show us that people are "well off" because they can afford to run a car. There is only one main road out of the estate and in the winter it sometimes becomes "snow blocked." Is bus transport unpopular because of its expense? (a typical journey of 8 miles costs Â£1.00) More women work locally (64% work 1-6 miles away) and more can therefore walk to work whereas most men (38% work 10-12 miles away in the Cardiff area.)
